Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/Chicago
ShortDescription: Revised: NB 151 Sheridan buses temp rerouted via Michigan, Ontario, State, Chicago & Michigan, due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Revised: #151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Ontario, State, Chicago and Michigan, due to police activity near Michigan/Chicago.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #55 Garfield Temporary Eastbound Reroute near 55th/Ashland
ShortDescription: Eastbound 55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via: 55th, Ashland, 59th, Racine and 55th due to, street blockage near 55th/Ashland

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #55 Garfield buses are temporarily rerouted via: 55th, Ashland, 59th, Racine and 55th due to, street blockage near 55th/Ashland.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed near Grand
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing near Grand due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing near Grand due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
